title: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty
tags: Visual Novel,Historical,Multiple Endings,Interactive Fiction,Story Rich,Dating Sim,Adventure,Dark,Anime,Cooking,Cute,Word Game,Drama,Romance,RPG,Psychological Horror,Singleplayer,Mystery,Casual,Medieval
features: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Family Sharing
description: Trek across ancient China in a dark, boundary-pushing visual novel inspired by traditional Chinese art with modern animation. Escort four girls to the prosperous city of Luoyang in a branching narrative with themes of revenge, cannibalism, involuntary servitude, and more on a redemptive journey.
